page.title: 03FAMILY LIFE
page.content: { My Mum's name is Diana. When my Mum {gets up she feeds my baby brother Carl {and then she changes his nappy and {gets us ready for school. When we are {at school she does the housework and {takes Carl for a walk. When we come {home she makes our tea. My Dad doesn't {get home until our bedtime as he works {at Sellafield, then my Mum makes his {tea. NICOLA aged 7 { { I don't like my Mum going to work {but we need the money. She goes to the {canteen in Glaxo and she works at {night and Neil looks after us. We miss {our Mum a lot and when we are at home {our Mum is at work and when our Mum is {at home we are at school. {BEVERLY aged 7
